meanings.sent1: After stirring the sugar in water, it will redissolve.
meanings.sent2: If you add more salt to the solution, it will redissolve completely.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the salt, but luckily it redissolved in the water.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was so thick that you could almost feel it redissolve with each breath.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the sun caused the ice to slowly redissolve into a puddle.

meanings.sent1: The sugar crystals will redissolve when heated.
meanings.sent2: If left undisturbed, the tablet will redissolve in the water.
meanings.sent3: The mystery of the disappearing ink was finally solved when it redissolved in the rain.
meanings.sent4: As the music played, the tension in the room seemed to redissolve into a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting seemed to blend and redissolve into a beautiful masterpiece.
